text:
[Verse]
Woke up from a dream
City lights so bright
Neon signs they gleam
Stars lost in the night

[Verse 2]
Walking down the street
Rhythms in my feet
People that I meet
Dancing to the beat

[Chorus]
Oh those city lights
Shining through the dark
Heartbeats and delights
Lighting up the spark

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the air
Music everywhere
No room for despair
Feel the love we share

[Verse 4]
In this urban maze
Lost but not afraid
Living in a haze
Together we've stayed

[Chorus]
Oh those city lights
Shining through the dark
Heartbeats and delights
Lighting up the spark
title: City Lights
